meeting_info.organization: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the May 20, 2024, Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Urban Agriculture and Chapter 251 of the Texas Agriculture Code
agenda_items.description: Overview of changes to Chapter 251 of the Texas Agriculture Code and potential actions the city may desire to take.

agenda_items.title: Consider amending the one-year limitation on subsequent representation by former councilmembers and former members of boards, commissions, and other city bodies in Chapter 12A
agenda_items.description: Discussion on proposed amendments to Chapter 12A regarding representation limitations.

agenda_items.title: 311 Customer Service Budget Review
agenda_items.description: Review of the budget for the 311 Customer Service department.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Animal Services Budget Review
agenda_items.description: Review of the budget for Dallas Animal Services.

agenda_items.title: Office of Arts and Culture Budget Review
agenda_items.description: Review of the budget for the Office of Arts and Culture.

agenda_items.title: Department of Sanitation Services Budget Review
agenda_items.description: Review of the budget for the Department of Sanitation Services.

agenda_items.title: Consideration of a Boundary Adjustment with the City of University Park
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the boundary adjustment request involving Michael M. Boone Elementary and adjacent church.

agenda_items.title: National League of Cities - Cities Addressing Fines and Fees Equitably (CAFFE): People and Pets Assistance Program Grant Approval
agenda_items.description: Approval of grant funding for the CAFFE initiative.

agenda_items.title: Legislative Priorities
agenda_items.description: Discussion on proposed legislative priorities for the upcoming session.

agenda_items.title: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Forecast
agenda_items.description: Forecast of upcoming agenda items for the committee.

financial_items.description: Dallas Animal Services current FY budget
Office of Arts and Culture current FY budget
Department of Sanitation Services planned FY budget
